description:
**App Store Rewind 2011: Magic Numbers Newsstand App of the year in Germany, Austria and Switzerland**
Our October 2012 issue is now FREE for all magic numbers users!

Magic Numbers is a global magazine that brings all the worldwide trends and market research results on what really affects us as human-beings living in society. 

Whether it’s about people’s habits, customs, and behaviors, or opinions on international politics, products, brands and new technology, you will always find something interesting to read, no matter what your area of business is. You can be sure that you will find, inside every issue of Magic Numbers, useful and interesting facts about what is going on in the world today.
This highly interactive publication is as easy to navigate as it is to read. Graphics are clear and concise and are accompanied by exhaustive articles, which makes it extremely enjoyable.  
By downloading the app, you will have the option to have access the current issue as well as the option to purchase all of our back issues!


Magic Numbers gives an in-depth exploration of the three following subjects on a global scale: 
• Politics, sports and society; up-to-date articles about the events that influence the world and our lives. 
• Products, brands and preferences; unveil what are the secrets to the success of a brand and what makes it thrive.
• Lifestyle, personal habits and customs; discover what unites us as a community and learn about customs from all over the world. 


About the magazine: 
The content comes from the results of different international polls, assembled over the course of a specific time period. The results are presented to the reader with easy to read graphics and enable readers to understand what people, as consumers and members of society, think on a global scale.  “Revealing the world’s opinion” is our motto; your opinion is what makes Magic Numbers.

About subscriptions: 
Besides the current issue of Magic Numbers Magazine, we offer our users the option to subscribe to the magazine with a great advantage! The subscription periods that we offer are for 3 or 6 months. Because Magic Numbers is a monthly digital magazine, our subscribers will have access to 3 or 6 issues of the magazine respectively, including the current issue. The subscription price is shown in the process of subscription and normally includes a discount of 20% to 30% over the regular single issue purchase. The subscriptions are auto-renewable; if you want to cancel your subscription, you must turn off the auto-renew in your account settings at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. 
- 3 Months subscription (3 issues): $11,99 US / 7,99 £ / 9,99 €
- 6 Months Subscription (6 issues): $20,99 US / 14,99 £ / 16,99 €

Please visit our privacy policy and terms of use if you have any doubts: http://www.magicnumbers-mag.com/privacy-policy.html
